entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @TulsaPort @USDOT If you cared about the people of OK you’d cancel Saturday’s planned super spreader campaign rally. You would also tell the truth about protecting ourselves & others from still raging COVID-19 pandemic. But that wouldn’t serve your self serving purpose. https://t.co/CYyHrPBGvy
